divs: Sighting Detailswe were inside on the pc when my dog started barking and my tv and pc bothcrashed and all sings of power sources were lost including torches.we went outside to the lake to find a object hovering above our house.it had no sound andleft about after an hour.it was about 20m of the ground and a thing startedhovering under the aircraft laura said it was an alien but it couldnt have beenbecause none of us believed in them it dropped something in the dirt and when ithit the ground a lightning bolt hit the tree behind us and we looked back at thecraft and it was gone we went and had a look at the object it apeared to becircular and very hot so went back inside and came back in the morning and itwas gone
